question: Which company appeared in Fortune's annual list of the Top 50 companies that are changing the world?
explanation: TCS (Tata Consultancy Services) appeared in Fortune's annual list of the Top 50 companies that are changing the world. It is the only Indian Company that made to the list. TCS is ranked number 30 on the list. TCS's mKRISHI App is one of the important reasons that got TCS into the list. It lets farmers to access customised expert advice, market information and weather data.
